text: The violet-fronted brilliant (Heliodoxa leadbeateri) is a species of hummingbird. It is found in Bolivia, Colombia, Ecuador, Peru, and Venezuela. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist montane forests. == References == * BirdLife International 2004. Heliodoxa leadbeateri . 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 10 July 2007. Category:Birds of South America Category:Hummingbirds
title: Violet-fronted brilliant
